Attribute.Name: CustomerID
Attribute.Description: The identifier for the customer. If this attribute is passed, OrganizationCode is required to be passed too.

Attribute.Name: CustomerKey
Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER table. This attribute corresponds to the PrimaryKey Fact

Attribute.Name: OrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: The organization code of organization that defines this customer. This attribute corresponds to the OrganizationCode Fact.

Attribute.Name: PersonInfoKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_PERSON_INFO that stores contact information of a person or a business. This attribute corresponds to the PrimaryKey Fact.

Attribute.Name: PersonInfoKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_PERSON_INFO that stores contact information of a person or a business. This attribute corresponds to the PrimaryKey Fact.
